uthsawa awasthawanta galapena wilasitha,sari wilasitha,memanma kanthawan athara wadi prasiddhiyak kamaththak dina ganimata salwar wilasithawa da samath wi atha.salwar indiyanu wilasithawak wana athara danata lankawa thula sigrayen kanthawan athara prasiddhiyata path wi atha.oonama wishesha awasthawanhidi salwar wilasithawak hatiyata bhawitha kala haka.elesama mema wilasithawa bhawitha kala haki awastha kihipayakma atha.
